= Update or Install Configuration

This config section convert environment variable related to update or install configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$converters/update_init.adoc[]


[[option_upgrade_path]]
== upgrade_path
NOTE: specify an additional upgrade path.

Odoo cli used:

* --upgrade-path

The environment variable `UPGRADE_PATH` is xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_repeatable[repeatable]. +
This mean a suffix can be added after an **single** `_`.
For example `UPGRADE_PATH_value`, the suffix is `value` not `_value`


[[option_pre_upgrade_scripts]]
== pre_upgrade_scripts
NOTE: Run specific upgrade scripts before loading any module when -u is provided.

Odoo cli used:

* --pre-upgrade-scripts

The environment variable `PRE_UPGRADE_SCRIPTS` is xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_repeatable[repeatable]. +
This mean a suffix can be added after an **single** `_`.
For example `PRE_UPGRADE_SCRIPTS_value`, the suffix is `value` not `_value`




== Other environment keys



[[env_INIT]]
=== INIT
Initialise (install/re-install) odoo modules.

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `INIT` is used and expect a `set`.

NOTE: No cli argument exist for this key


[[env_REINIT]]
=== REINIT
Initialise (install/re-install) odoo modules.

TIP: Only Odoo version 19.0 is supported

The environment variable `REINIT` is used and expect a `set`.

NOTE: No cli argument exist for this key


[[env_UPDATE]]
=== UPDATE
Update odoo modules.

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `UPDATE` is used and expect a `set`.

NOTE: No cli argument exist for this key
